greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of endofunctions on [n] such that the LCM of their cycle lengths equals n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..389
maple: b:= proc(n, m) option remember; `if`(n=0, x^m, add((j-1)!*
a:= n-> add(coeff(b(j, 1), x, n)*n^(n-j)*binomial(n-1, j-1), j=0..n):
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 15 2017
